triplets: Specialized emergency vehicle designed for transporting patients and providing pre-hospital medical care
Transporting injured or ill patients, providing emergency medical assistance, and rapid response to accidents
Reinforced metal body, glass windows, interior medical equipment materials like plastics, steel, and aluminum
Siren, stretcher, medical equipment, oxygen cylinders, interior cabinets, emergency lights, radio communication system
Emergency medical services (EMS), hospital response system, disaster response units
Various commercial vehicle manufacturers and emergency vehicle upfitters
